algorithms
Class QLIntegerSelector

java.lang.Object
  algorithms.QLIntegerSelector
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISelector, IStrategy, IStrategyLearner, java.io.Serializable
public class QLIntegerSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISelector

Experimental implementation of Compact Q-Learning algorithm : All numbers are integers, and can be restricted to bytes See the paper

See Also:
